desc.design: Led the UI and UX design of the website, created sitemap wireframes, and functional prototypes.
desc.development: Advocated for and developed a refactored build using modern tech for improved performance.

desc.design: Designed the characters, revamped the environment, and polished UI elements to enhance user experience.
desc.development: Developed a Unity game with a Qualtrics integration to collect interaction data.

study.overview: Challenges: Our team Skyfall was asked to build a product for iOS and work with TestFlight. We were asked to analyze the previous prototype and consider a way forward, and we chose to reprogram from scratch. We were also asked to develop a user data metrics collection module to store data in an online database.
study.roles: Project Manager, Scrum Master, 3D & UX Designer. I was mainly responsible for Project management and Scrum duties. Although, I also helped out in art, design and implementation wherever opportunity presented itself.
study.goals: Goals: (1) making a scalable iOS Application for iPad Minis. (2) Developing the backend module for collecting data. (3) And running a usability test round to iterate on controls and UI.
study.results: Results: We successfully developed a scalable iOS application for iPad Minis. We also developed a backend module for collecting data. We ran a usability test round to iterate on controls and UI. We also developed a user data metrics collection module to store data in an online database.

desc.design: Designed 3D assets and UI elements, created a technical pipeline for the team, and provided feedback on assets.
desc.development: Managed the git repository, resolved merge conflicts, and added new features.

desc.design: Coordinated, produced, and sourced digital assets, helped author 2 optical installations, and styled a tooltip for publication.
